Text.Page:
, I've located the last stone. Meet me in Highwatch.

- Meren

The last stone to be retrieved, the Passion Stone, was in Lilith's Trial.
Coincidentally, Meren needed Platinum from Lilith's Trial for the banquet.

After defeating Arachandlebra and Lilith, you retrieved both the Platinum and the Passion Stone. Finally, the Eternal Crown was complete.

, I've traced the last stone, and it's in the possession of Lilith. Sort of.

Specifically, we've found a version of it in Lilith's Trial, one of the Ace Dungeons Clahk is working on.

Our thinking is that if you enter the simulation with the crown, the stone will become real, and we can complete the gift!

Oh, and I'm sorry about the short notice, but if you could retrieve some Platinum while you're in there, we can really use some for the banquet."Platinum?"

Our artisans are creating grand illusions of music and light for the banquet, and we need a supply of Platinum to ensure each one goes off at the right time.

But we don't have any Platinum...

and the Black Market is out of stock."I'll get that Platinum."

It's very dangerous...
but I believe in you.

You have a chance to obtain Platinum in Lilith's Keep.

May the goddess watch upon you!

You've got it!
Now our preparations for the banquet are all but complete!

Did you find the Passion Stone?"Of course."

That's the last stone...

Place it on the crown.

So this is how the crown looked when you first saw it?

It seems to be much more powerful than before...just like you. I think that the goddess will love this gift.

Thank you, ."You're welcome."

Oh, I almost forgot. You'll receive your invitation soon.
I'll see you at the banquet.

Take care!
